multiplechoiceresponse.p: Redis tracks the messages delivered to a consumer using the Pending Entries List (PEL). How are entries removed from the PEL?
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Choose one answer:

choicegroup.choice: As consumers explicitly acknowledge them using XACK

div.p: Entries are removed from the PEL using the XACK command, which tells Redis that a consumer has successfully processed a message.
